## Loading the Data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

vaccinations <- "data/_raw/country_vaccinations.csv"

vaccinations_data <- read_csv(vaccinations)

manufacturer <- "data/_raw/country_vaccinations_by_manufacturer.csv"

manufacturer_data <- read_csv(manufacturer)
```
